pwople.name: andrew hawkes
pwople.p1: andy has been involved in professional audio design and operations for over 25 years.
pwople.p2: after several years running live events, he branched into technical and project management where he developed a strong interest in venue operations and workflows.

pwople.name: martin robert
pwople.p1: martin's career has spanned many facets of lighting and video from global tours with a-list artists, permanent installations on iconic buildings to consulting for global events.
pwople.p2: his current development is centred on dynamic, generative and communicative control systems.

pwople.name: sky bembury
pwople.p1: for over 20 years, sky has been working across the usa, europe and the middle east. his previous work has included several hotels, restaurants and residences.
pwople.p2: sky also acts as our lead designer for custom fittings and fixtures.
